name: daily-aesthetic-backend
description: Backend API for The Daily Aesthetic

scripts.db:setup: psql -U postgres -f db/schema.sql && psql -U postgres -d daily_aesthetic -f db/seed.sql
scripts.db:setup-v2: psql -U postgres -f db/schema-v2.sql && psql -U postgres -d daily_aesthetic -f db/admin-schema.sql
